TopicTitle: In need of helpful gamers who are willing to contribute to my thesis research

Articles.Content:
UPDATE

Guys, I just wanted to tell you that my goal was reached and I collected enough responses. Actually, I collected almost 4 times more responses than what I expected!!!

Your help is absolutely invaluable and I cannot find the words to thank you properly!

I will start sending out the gift boxes a bit earlier than planned, probably around the 25th of May. So stay tuned and be patient - it will take me quite some time to reach you all ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

**Thank you!**

*Hello people!*

*I am a final year student in the Netherlands and I am doing a marketing research for my graduation thesis. I need to find out what games you like and where you play them. To do so, I created this questionnaire - and it's all about games* ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

*I would be eternally grateful if you'd spend a couple of minutes (no more than 10, I promise!) to fill it in.* 

*If you do fill it in, and if you have a Steam account, then I can send you a small gift - either a CS:GO, Dota, or a TF2 box. Just leave your details (Steam account URL and Steam Trade URL) at the end of the questionnaire, and as soon as I close it I will start sending the items. I will make sure that everybody receives something* ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

*Happy gaming!*

*@dimdimdov*

*EDIT**: I just posted the questionnaire on the Steam* [*subreddit*](http://www.reddit.com/r/Steam/comments/365syn/would_you_fill_in_a_gaming_survey_for_my/) *cuz I will need some extra responses. If you happen to go there, would you please bump it up?* ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-16T22:10:50Z" title="05/16/2015 10:10  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 16, 2015</time> by dimdimdov**

Welcome aboard!

I'll stick this for you for a bit to get some exposure. Good luck with your thesis.

Edit: Ouch at grouping everyone older than 32 into one demographic group. :/

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-13T15:46:38Z" title="05/13/2015 03:46  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 13, 2015</time> by Red Iron Crown**
It was fun ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
I'll try to do this at home! Good luck, dimdimdov!
Ohh I love research things about games ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Im going to do this survey.
Filled it out. Good luck and post the results somewhere later.

Is "Indie" a genre of game and what classifies a game as "Indie"? How about "Action"? "Adventure"? Why is "Racing" not in "Sports" or "Simulation"?

Man, game genres are really quite subjective...
Filled it out for ya.
I love you mom! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Done!
Filled out.
Fun, you forgot Canada ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> Fun, you forgot Canada ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

And about 180 other countries ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Filled it, It must serve some purpose.

> 
> Edit: Ouch at grouping everyone older than 32 into one demographic group. :/

Yeah, I know ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) It was for the sake of simplicity, and to satisfy my supervisors. 

Anyways, thank you for having me here and for filling it out! 

I actually also posted it on the KSP subreddit, but the guys crucified me, literally :/

> 
> Is "Indie" a genre of game and what classifies a game as "Indie"? How about "Action"? "Adventure"? Why is "Racing" not in "Sports" or "Simulation"?
> Man, game genres are really quite subjective...

The focus of my research is Steam... so I used their genre classification. I also don't agree that "Indie" is a separate genre but... meh...![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-15T11:14:50Z" title="05/15/2015 11:14  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 15, 2015</time> by dimdimdov**

> 
> And about 180 other countries ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I know! It's because of the damn tool - Usabilla. If you ever have to do an online questionnaire, try something else! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

My options were 1) manually add all countries ![:sealed:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_lipssealed.gif), or 2) add only those that my research is focused on
